refnamediv.refpurpose: A file icon list widget for GTK.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "activate-icon" : Run Last "click-event" : Run Last "deactivate-icon" : Run Last "select-icon" : Run Last "text-changed" : Run Last "unselect-icon" : Run First

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GtkIconList is a GtkFixed subclass that allows you to display a table of xpm icons with editable labels. It's completely designed from scratch with some ideas borrowed from gnome-icon-list. It contains almost all of its features and more. It can be used for file browsers and as a replacement of gnome-icon-list (without the need of using gnome libraries). Like GtkSheet, it uses the widget GtkItemEntry to edit the text fields.

refsect2.title: GtkIconList
refsect2.para: The GtkIconList structure contains only private data. It should only be accessed through the functions described below.

refsect2.title: enum GtkIconListMode
GtkIconListItem
refsect2.para: The GtkIconListItem structure contains only private data. It should only be accessed through the functions described below.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GtkIconList widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_construct ()
refsect2.para: Initialize iconlist structure.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_mode ()
refsect2.para: Set the icons display mode .

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_mode ()
refsect2.para: Get the icons display mode .

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_editable ()
refsect2.para: Set if the user can edit the text in the editable widget or not.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_is_editable ()
refsect2.para: Get the editable status of icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_row_spacing ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon spacing between rows.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_row_spacing ()
refsect2.para: Get the spacing between rows.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_col_spacing ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon spacing between columns.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_col_spacing ()
refsect2.para: Get the spacing between columns.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_text_space ()
refsect2.para: Set the text max size in pixels.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_text_space ()
refsect2.para: Get the text maximum size in pixels.

listitem.simpara: text maximum size distance in pixels.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_icon_border ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon border.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_icon_border ()
refsect2.para: Get the icon border width.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_icon_width ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon width.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_icon_width ()
refsect2.para: Get the icon width.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_freeze ()
refsect2.para: Freeze icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_thaw ()
refsect2.para: Thaw(unfreeze) icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_background ()
refsect2.para: Set the iconlist background color.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_add_from_pixmap ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkIconListItem * gtk_icon_list_add_from_pixmap (GtkIconList *icon_list, GdkPixmap *pixmap, GdkBitmap *bitmap_mask, const gchar *label, gpointer link);
refsect2.para: Add a icon to the icon list.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().
a gpointer link to some data

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_add_from_data ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkIconListItem * gtk_icon_list_add_from_data (GtkIconList *iconlist, gchar **data, const gchar *label, gpointer link);
refsect2.para: Add a icon to the icon list.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().
pointer to the xpm data string

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_add ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkIconListItem * gtk_icon_list_add (GtkIconList *iconlist, const gchar *pixmap_file, const gchar *label, gpointer link);
refsect2.para: Add a icon to the icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_nth ()
refsect2.para: Get nth icon from the icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_index ()
refsect2.para: Get the index number of the icon specified by its GtkIconListItem pointer.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_remove ()
refsect2.para: Remove the icon from the iconlist.

listitem.simpara: a GtkIconList widget created with gtk_icon_list_new().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_active_icon ()
refsect2.para: Set an active icon in the icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_remove_nth ()
refsect2.para: Remove nth icon from the iconlist.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_update ()
refsect2.para: Update the icon list widget..

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_clear ()
refsect2.para: Clear the icon list widget.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_link ()
refsect2.para: Add a gpointer link to a icon from the iconlist.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_link ()
refsect2.para: Add a gpointer link to a icon from the iconlist.

listitem.simpara: (transfer none) a gpointer to some data sed with gtk_icon_list_link().

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_icon_from_link ()
refsect2.para: Gets the icon pointer from the link attached to it.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_icon_at ()
refsect2.para: Get the icon situated at x,y coordinates in icon list.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_active_icon ()
refsect2.para: Set the iconlist background color.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_entry ()
refsect2.para: Get the item->entry.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_get_pixmap ()
refsect2.para: Get the icon pixmap.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_pixmap ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon pixmap.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_label ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon label.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_set_selection_mode ()
refsect2.para: Set the icon selection mode.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_select_icon ()
refsect2.para: Select the icon specified by pointer.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_unselect_icon ()
refsect2.para: Unselect the icon specified by pointer.

refsect2.title: gtk_icon_list_unselect_all ()
refsect2.para: Unselect all icons.

refsect2.title: The "activate-icon" signal
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean user_function (GtkIconList *iconlist, GtkIconListItem *arg1, gpointer user_data) : Run Last

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
